name: GameLog
description: Lightweight runtime logging wrapper. Enabled in Editor/Development builds or when GAME_LOGS_ENABLED is defined.

name: ServiceLocator
description: Simple static Service Locator for registering and retrieving global services.

name: GameStateManager
description: Manages the global state of the game (Exploration, Combat) and publishes OnCombatStarted/OnCombatEnded events.

name: CombatTransitionManager
description: Manages visual transitions between exploration and combat using TransitionSequence tasks.

name: CombatScenePool
description: Pool for combat scene prefabs with Addressables support and Resources/fallback instantiation.

name: CombatEncounter
description: Component configuring a combat encounter: prefab/address/resource, prewarm and pooling options.

name: CombatTrigger
description: Starts a combat encounter when the player interacts; requests instance from pool and kicks off transition.

name: TurnBasedCombatManager
description: Coordinates the turn-based combat flow (planning -> executing) and related services.

name: CombatUI
description: Manages the combat UI, player stats display and action buttons.

name: GameEventBus
description: Global event bus for decoupled publish/subscribe of game events.

name: TransitionSequence
description: ScriptableObject that holds and executes a list of TransitionTask instances as a coroutine.
